-1.plot: Week 17: Chiefs at Broncos Game Highlights

imdb.plot outline: We've got every angle covered. Each week, you'll get a comprehensive highlight package featuring all the key moments, best plays, hardest hits, and close calls from each Chiefs game. Experience all the highs and lows of the Chiefs season-long quest for NFL glory. Hear from players and coaches during post-game news conferences and listen to the game as called by the local radio broadcasters - the ones who know the Chiefs best.
